overview: A young woman gets pregnant out of wedlock by a homosexual man in a society that loathes the idea of both homosexuality and unmarried pregnancy. The young woman is terrified because she is worried about what her family will think when she gets pregnant. Then she seeks to get married but she finds out that the man who got her pregnant is homosexual. She is now devastated and afraid that she will be found out and will be punished.
title: The Surrogate
